channel.title: Changing how many times a special hits 317
channel.description: I'm in the midst of a very basic but intense project and I was wondering how I change how many times a special attack hits. I've tried looking at the differences between dds and d long but I can't get it. Any help ?

item.title: Changing how many times a special hits 317
item.dc:creator: @nsfpure nsfpure
item.description:
@nsfpure wrote:

[quote=“Tobbescape, post:6, topic:400011”][quote author=nsfpure link=topic=497110.msg3634899#msg3634899 date=1308522781]

Try searching for SpecialAttack.java

There’s no file called specialattact.java
[/quote] search for the weapon id in your source folder then[/quote]
Will do in the morning. I’m on my phone

Read full topic
item.source: Changing how many times a special hits 317

item.title: Changing how many times a special hits 317
item.dc:creator: @Marine5287 Marine5287
item.description:
@Marine5287 wrote:

It matters what the base it, if it’s Project Insanity, there are codes for special attack codes in ItemAssistant.java

So if you want it to hit 4 times, just take some of the code from dragon claws. Example of the dragon claws code:

case 14484: //dragon claws c.getPA().sendFrame171(0, 7800); specialAmount(weapon, c.specAmount, 7812); break;

Read full topic
item.source: Changing how many times a special hits 317
